channel.title: New smithing screen
channel.description:
I want to make it so that if you use a gold bar with an anvil, it with you the option making a godsword blade. You are going to require 75 smithing to make the blade. Any help, I imagine this will be a tough one.
Many thanks,
Syrillia.
*Never mind, done it.
